update sw_goods set creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ys_result = #{ysResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_no = #{tranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biz_object_id = #{bizObjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workflow_instance = #{workflowInstance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_commit = #{endCommit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_code = #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_detail = #{goodsDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_head_pic = #{goodsHeadPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sw_store_id = #{swStoreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_company = #{goodsCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sw_store_name = #{swStoreName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_total_num = #{goodsTotalNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sequece_no = #{sequeceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT sw_goods.goods_code, sw_goods.goods_company, sw_goods.goods_total_num, sw_goods.goods_name, sw_goods.sw_store_name, sw_store.store_address, sw_store.store_goods_num, sw_store.store_goods_sku_num, sw_store.store_admin FROM sw_goods left join sw_store on sw_goods.sw_store_id=sw_store.id where sw_goods.deleted=0 and sw_store.is_enabled=1 and sw_goods.id=#{id};
